Name: The Dead Prince
About the game: The Dead Prince is a turn based stealth puzzle game where you play a blood magic assassin fulfilling the pact his family made long ago. The Sultanâ€™s enemies are closing in, use your assortment of magical abilities to sneak through bases, take down guards, and assassinate your target. Use an assortment of powers Harness mana and blood based abilities to overcome obstacles and carve your own path through each scenario. Your choices of which abilities to use will have an effect on what resources you have available in subsequent challenges. Sneak through bases The multiple paths, collectables, and challenges bring replayability and the power to choose your own path. Choose your own path Feature List 66+ stealth puzzles with multiple solutions. 8 unique powers Different enemy types with distinct dangers Beautiful pixel art visuals
